decoworld.server

Class ManagementApi

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.server.ManagementApi

  • public class ManagementApi
extends java.lang.Object
    A class accessible by all so that common game management tasks can be easily accessed and completed.

      • handleDataRequest

        public static void handleDataRequest(decoworld.protocol.management.DataRequest request,
                     com.esotericsoftware.kryonet.Connection conn)
        Attempt to handle a DataRequest by a Client. Each case corresponds to information required by the dev.
        Parameters:
        request - The DataRequest object which will contain the information required to complete the request
        conn - The connection back to the requesting client.

        Kills the connection with a client
        Parameters:
        user - The user whose connection we want to kill
        request - The KickUser request object which stores who ordered the kick and why.
